page.title: 13INDUSTRY IN SABDEN
page.content: {Pendle Furniture}is the biggest single industry in the village of{Sabden}.It makes and distributes furniture all over{England}and although there have been many{redundances,Pendle Furniture still employs a lot of people. Other Industries in{Sabden include {printing,cardboard tube manufacture {and tool making.Originally Sabden had {three cotton mills and people used to {travel from outside towns to work in {the village.}Nowadays the trend has reversed with most people coming and going out of the village to their employment. The rest of our D-Block is mostly a farming district with the exception of small isolated cottage industries like the Trapp Forge.Here we a blacksmith who makes wrought-iron gates,horse shoes,fire side furniture and ornamental signs. {JAMES TAYLOR.
